/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their lush green leaves contrasting beautifully with the clear blue sky above. The trees are evenly spaced, creating a rhythmic pattern that adds to the visual appeal of the scene. In the distance, buildings can be seen, their presence subtly reminding us of the urban environment surrounding this serene street. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, enhancing the colors and details of the scene.
